main.description: A standard unit of measure, defined and adopted by convention or by law.

omUnitIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the om unit of measure, for standardization across networks.

label.description: The display label defined for the network for the unit of measure, overrides om.

symbol.description: The display symbol defined for the network for the unit of measure, overrides om.

classifiedAs.description: References one or more uri's for a concept in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme for purposes of categorization or grouping; or it can be one or more string classifications such as tags.
